title: Machine learning analysis of Photometric data from the Dark Energy Survey
summary: This paper applies machine learning methods (ANNz2, GPz, Keras) to publicly available Dark Energy Survey data release 2 (DR2) to estimate the distribution of photometric redshift. The goal is to retrieve cosmological parameters from photometric surveys.
usefulness_reason: The paper uses "Dark Energy Survey data", which is relevant to "Survey data". However, it does not explicitly mention "Point Process" or "Contextual dataset".
